img_above_text:
Defeat this third frog menace, and you'll gain another Tadpole and other materials to upgrade your Spirits and gear.
Lang-Li-Guhh-Lang
img_below_text:
You can head up the canyon past where the frog miniboss was to find some plants to harvest and a path leading into a large forested field where the Towers of Karma are, but first we'll head back to the main road.
![Wukong Felicity 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/83/Wukong_Felicity_13.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a snowy canyon environment from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. The player character, armed with a staff, is navigating through the icy terrain surrounded by rocky cliffs and sparse vegetation. The preceding text suggests the player has recently defeated a frog miniboss and obtained rewards, while the following text indicates the player can explore further up the canyon to gather resources and access a forested area leading to the Towers of Karma. The image likely illustrates the transition area between these events.
